name: Observer Ward
lore: A form of half-sentient plant, often cultivated by apprentice wizards.

Plant.description: Plants an Observer Ward, an invisible watcher that gives ground vision in a 1600 radius to your team. Lasts 6 minutes. Hold Control to give one Observer Ward to an allied hero.

Planted Ward.description: This unit is permanently invisible and phased.

name: Urn of Shadows
lore: Contains the ashes of powerful demons.

Soul Release.description: Provides 30 health regeneration when cast on allies, and deals 25 damage per second when cast on enemies. Lasts 8 seconds. Gains charges every time an enemy hero dies within 1400 units. Only the closest Urn to the dying hero will gain a charge.

Upgrade: Town Portal Scroll.description: Boots of Travel:Upgrades your Town Portal Scroll, allowing it to target units, reduces cooldown and does not consume a charge on usage. Boots of Travel 2:Upgrades your Town Portal Scroll, allowing it to target units and heroes, reduces cooldown, channel time and does not consume a charge on usage.

name: Hand of Midas
lore: Preserved through unknown magical means, the Hand of Midas is a weapon of greed, sacrificing animals to line the owner's pockets.

Transmute.description: Kills a non-hero target for 160 gold and 2.1x experience. Cannot be used on Ancient Creeps.

name: Mask of Madness
lore: Once this mask is worn, its bearer becomes an uncontrollable aggressive force.

Berserk.description: Gives 110 attack speed and 30 movement speed, but reduces your armor by 8 and silences you. Lasts 6 seconds.

Lifesteal.description: Heals the attacker for 24% of attack damage dealt. Lifesteal from creeps is reduced by 50%

name: Buckler
lore: A powerful shield that imbues the bearer with the strength of heroes past, it is capable of protecting entire armies in battle.

name: Phase Boots
lore: Boots that allow the wearer to travel between the ether.

Phase.description: Gives 20% increased movement speed on melee heroes, and 10% on ranged heroes, and lets you move through units and turn more quickly for 3 seconds.

name: Oblivion Staff
lore: Deceptively hidden as an ordinary quarterstaff, it is actually very powerful, much like the Eldritch who originally possessed it.

name: Ring of Basilius
lore: Ring given as a reward to the greatest mages.

name: Moon Shard
lore: Said to be a tear from the lunar goddess Selemene.

Consume.description: Consume the Moon Shard to permanently gain 60 attack speed and 200 bonus night vision. Max 1 use.

name: Helm of the Dominator
lore: The powerful headpiece of a dead necromancer.

Dominate.description: Takes control of one neutral target unit and sets its movement speed to 380 and max health to a minimum of 1000. Also provides the unit with +25 base attack damage, +12 health regen, +4 mana regen and +4 armor. Dominated units with a max health of greater than 1000 retain their original max health.  Dominated unit's bounty is set to 100 gold.

name: Headdress
lore: Creates a soothing aura that restores allies in battle.

Switch Attribute.description: Switches between +10 Strength, +10 Agility, or +10 Intelligence.

name: Helm of the Overlord
lore: The powerful headpiece of a dead necromancer.

Dominate.description: Takes control of one neutral target unit and sets its movement speed to 380 and max health to a minimum of 1800. Also provides the unit with +70 base attack damage, +12 health regen, +4 mana regen and +7 armor. Dominated units with a max health of greater than 1800 retain their original max health. Dominated unit's bounty is set to 250 gold.

Vladmir's Aura.description: Grants 20% lifesteal, 18% bonus damage, 2 mana regeneration, and 3 armor to nearby allies. Lifesteal from creeps is reduced by 50%

name: Perseverance
lore: A gem that grants heart to the bearer.

name: Falcon Blade
lore: An enchanted blade that long ago raised a hopeless urchin from pauper to king.

name: Arcane Ring
lore: Once a prized heirloom of a minor lord's house.

Replenish Mana.description: Restores 75 mana to all nearby allies.

name: Stygian Desolator
lore: The original demonic favorite that served as basis for the beloved mortal design.

Greater Corruption.description: Your attacks reduce the target's armor by 10 for 7 seconds.

name: Seer Stone
lore: The curious creation of a wizard who professed to hail from another time.

Reveal.description: Reveal a target 800 area of the map for 6 seconds.

name: Pirate Hat
lore: A salty skulltopper cursed with endless good fortune.

Dig.description: Channel for 1 second. Always finds a Bounty Rune!

name: Giant's Ring
lore: Prized procurement of an otherwise unremarkable ruler of Elze who abdicated his position and vanished.

Giant's Foot.description: Can path over any terrain and deals 100% of your strength per second to units you are standing ontop of.

name: Mirror Shield
lore: The shield that long ago robbed the old one of his first memories.

Echo Shield.description: Block and reflect most targeted spells back to their caster once every 12 seconds.

name: Force Boots
lore: Elusive marvels never successfully studied for proper classification in the archives.

Force.description: Dispels the user and pushes them 750 units in the direction they are facing.

Speed Unlock.description: Completely removes the speed limit for the wearer.

name: Fallen Sky
lore: One of the few surviving creations of the acolytes of the Wyrmforge.

Fallen Sky.description: Transforms into a meteor that strikes down at the target area after 1 seconds in a 315 AoE, stunning enemies for 1.6 seconds and dealing impact damage. Continues to deal damage every 1 seconds to enemy units and buildings for 6 seconds.

name: Ex Machina
lore: The remains of an ancient universe, preserved within a single sphere.

Reset Cooldowns.description: Reset the cooldowns on all items (except Refresher Orb).

name: Book of the Dead
lore: A record of the final reckoning. With one page torn out.

Greater Demonic Summoning.description: Summons 4 level 3 Necronomicon Units that last 75 seconds. Units have 100% more health and 75% more damage.

Mana Break.description: Mana burned per hit, a portion of which is dealt as damage.

Last Will.description: Deals damage to the unit that kills the Necronomicon Warrior.

Purge.description: Removes positive buffs from enemies and slow their movement speed.

name: Book of Shadows
lore: An impossible tome filled with unreadable prose of unknowable thoughts.

Shadows.description: Target an enemy, ally or self. Causes the target to become untargetable from enemies to the caster, but also silenced, muted and disarmed for 4 seconds. Applies a basic dispel.

name: Apex
lore: Three orbs of remarkable power bound within a single scepter.

name: Arcanist's Armor
lore: An exquisite piece commissioned by a paranoid monarch who choked on a piece of fruit long before the item saw its intended use.

Mega Shield.description: Force Field Aura Grants 40% Damage Reflection for 5 seconds.

Shield.description: Grants +5 armor and +20% Magic Resistance to all allies within 1200 radius.

name: Timeless Relic
lore: An unmarred discovery from the excavated ruins of an ancient wizard's academy.

name: Telescope
lore: A handy tool that manages to make close what once was far.

Prescient Aura.description: Lowers Scan cooldown by 50%. Increases attack and cast range of allies in a 1200 unit radius.

name: Trickster Cloak
lore: A fantastic garment immediately misplaced by its creator upon completion.

Cloak.description: Causes you to become invisible for 6 seconds.

name: Mind Breaker
lore: A bewitching blade of indeterminate form capable of piercing the psyche of even the most willful foe.

Silence Strike.description: The next attack silences the hit enemy for 2 seconds.

name: Spell Prism
lore: Even the slightest flaw in the components of a spell prism can result in the death of its user.

Cooldown Reduction.description: Reduces the cooldown time of all spells and items by 12%.

name: Martyr's Plate
lore: None

Martyrdom.description: Redirects 25% of all magic damage dealt to your allied heroes within 900 radius towards you for 10 seconds.

name: Stormcrafter
lore: The accidental byproduct of a spell conjured to entrap a lesser god.

Bottled Lightning.description: Zaps 2 enemies within 700 range, dealing 200 damage and a 40% slow for 0.4 seconds. Strikes every 3 seconds.

name: Penta-Edged Sword
lore: The final, twisted work of a severely pious blacksmith, completed immediately before the taking of his own life.

Maim.description: Each attack has a 25% chance to reduce enemy hero movement speed by 20% and attack speed by 60 for 3 seconds.

name: Ninja Gear
lore: Valuable equipment recovered by a young explorer sifting through the flotsam and detritus drifting in the void.

Solitary Disguise.description: Casts Smoke of Deceit on yourself only.

name: Ascetic's Cap
lore: An austere hat thought to be of Turstarkuri origin.

Endurance.description: Whenever a debuff would be applied to the owner, grant 40% Status resistance for 5 seconds.

name: Havoc Hammer
lore: None

Havoc.description: Pulls enemies in a 400 range around you, slowing them by 50% for 3 seconds and dealing 175 + 1.5 your str as magical damage.

name: Vindicator's Axe
lore: None

Vengeance.description: Provides 30 damage if equipped hero is Silenced and 20 armor if equipped hero is Stunned.

name: Quickening Charm
lore: An evergreen amulet of druidic origins.

Cooldown Reduction.description: Reduces the cooldown time of all spells and items by 10%

name: Ogre Seal Totem
lore: A totem carved from an ogre seal's tooth.

Ogre Seal Flop.description: Flop forward like an ogre seal 2 times, dealing 150 damage and slowing enemies in a 275 radius by 100% for 1.5 second on each bounce. 400 bounce distance.

name: Elven Tunic
lore: Even simple items of elven make it seem imbued with inexplicable efficacy.

name: Enchanted Quiver
lore: A graceful gift blessed by the goddess of the hunt.

Certain Strike.description: Empowers your next attack with 250 bonus magical damage and True Strike. Ranged Attackers have +350 bonus range for the attack.

name: Titan Sliver
lore: Though many desire this brilliant shard for its obvious qualities, a school of study exists to determine the true size and purpose of its incomprehensible whole.

name: Psychic Headband
lore: A failed experiment in finer telekinetic control, still fit for other ends.

Psychic Push.description: Pushes the target enemy unit away from you 400 distance.

name: Paladin Sword
lore: The sigil blade of the legendary Brother Yhols of Gausra, stripped from its scabbard on the day of his controversial excommunication.

Greater Healing.description: Amplifies the wearer's Regeneration, Healing, Lifesteal and Spell Lifesteal by 14%.

name: Cloak of Flames
lore: A very fine cloak that plays host to an overly-protective living flame.

Immolate.description: Burns enemy units for 45 damage per second. Illusions deal 30 damage per second.

name: Dandelion Amulet
lore: None

Magical Damage Block.description: Block 300 magic damage from damage instances over 75  damage

name: Ceremonial Robe
lore: One of many items lost in the looting of Zelenwyr's sacred reliquary.

Ceremonial Aura.description: Lowers enemy Status Resistance by 10% and Magic Resistance by 10%.

name: Defiant Shell
lore: None

Reciprocity.description: When attacked, the hero counter-attacks a target within their attack range.

Switch Attribute.description: There is no description for this ability.

name: Vampire Fangs
lore: None

Aquila Aura.description: Grants 1 mana regeneration and 2 armor to nearby allies. Deactivate to stop affecting non-hero units.

name: Specialist's Array
lore: An impressive kit of trigger enhancements born in an aging assassin's idle mind.

Crackshot.description: Ranged Only. The next attack fires projectiles at 2 additional targets within attack range. Does not trigger attack modifiers.

name: Grove Bow
lore: A gift from the moon goddess to one of her prized disciples many memories ago.

Magic Amp.description: Reduces magic resistance of the attacked enemy by 15%.

name: Gossamer Cape
lore: None

Sixth Sense.description: Automatically dodge the next attack from a hero.

name: Pupil's Gift
lore: An astounding plate of ever-replenishing, fortifying fruit.

name: Eye of the Vizier
lore: The ring of a cunning court mage who imprisoned a cadre of enemies to serve as his personal mana reserve.

name: Orb of Destruction
lore: An ingot of chaos suspended in wizard's ether, housed within an arcanist's orb.

Impeding Corruption.description: Attacks reduce the target's armor and movement speed. Slow amount varies based on whether the wearer is melee or ranged.

name: Philosopher's Stone
lore: A weightless charm created by an enchanter with a powerful scorn for brute force.

name: Dragon Scale
lore: The remains of a dragon always outvalue the wealth of even the most prodigious hoard.

Afterburn.description: Causes attacks to burn the enemy, dealing 22 damage per second for 3 seconds. Affects buildings.

name: Bullwhip
lore: Once the favored lash of an infamous broker of pit fighters and other live trade.

Whip.description: Grants 18% movement speed when cast on allies, and slows by 18% when cast on enemies. Lasts 4 seconds.

name: Tumbler's Toy
lore: An antique plaything found in the ruins of an Ozenja circus bazaar.

Vault.description: Propels your hero forward 300 units. Tumbler's Toy gets disabled for 3 seconds if its owner receives damage from a player source.

name: Pig Pole
lore: A makeshift charm misplaced by a peace-loving, addlebrained enchanter.

Pig, Out!.description: Turns your hero into a critter for 4 seconds and gives them +10% Movement Speed.

name: Seeds of Serenity
lore: An evergreen sprout treasured by the woodkin and highly coveted by interlopers and their like.

Verdurous Dale.description: Target the ground with a 400 radius. Provides +10 health regeneration to all allied units while they're in the area of effect.

name: Spark of Courage
lore: None

Courage.description: Provides 16 damage when the owner is above 50% health, and 7 armor when they are below that threshold.

name: Trusty Shovel
lore: Former plaything of a young deity, received as a gift from his uncle.

Dig.description: Channel for 1 second. Can find a Bounty Rune, a Flask, an Enchanted Mango, or a friendly Kobold.

Prospecting Aura.description: Kobolds are adept at finding gold, increasing nearby allied heroes' GPM.

name: Lance of Pursuit
lore: The gleaming weapon of a tarnished knight haunted by his duties to an unworthy king.

Hound.description: Attacking from behind slows enemies by 16% (8% if Ranged) and deals +15 more Damage. Slows lasts for 2 second.

name: Occult Bracelet
lore: A band that bears effigy of the dark goddess Eloshar's unsleeping eye.

Rites of Eloshar.description: Each time the wearer is attacked they gain a stack of 0.4 mana regen, up to 5 stacks. Stacks last for 5 seconds.

name: Fairy's Trinket
lore: A small token imbued with the fortune of the fae in recognition of an intriguing display of mortal kindness.

name: Arcane Blink
lore: A revitalizing tool to help bear the weight of arcane expenditure.

Arcane Blink.description: Teleport to a target point up to 1400 units away. Arcane Blink mutes for 3s after taking damage from an enemy hero or Roshan.

name: Overwhelming Blink
lore: A horrifying dagger forged in the chaos maw and nigh untouchable by mortal hands.

Overwhelming Blink.description: Teleport to a target point up to 1200 units away. After teleportation, all enemies in a 800 AoE take damage equal to 100 + 50% of your strength and an additional 100% over time, and have 50% movement speed slow and 50 attack speed slow for 6 seconds. Overwhelming Blink cannot be used for 6 seconds after taking damage from an enemy hero or Roshan.

name: Broom Handle
lore: The surprisingly dangerous creation of an apprentice sorcerer with a strange fondness for brooms.

name: Duelist Gloves
lore: None

Boldness.description: Grants 20 attack speed as long as there are enemy heroes within 1200 units.

name: Swift Blink
lore: A cunning blade able to anticipate and enable its bearer's movements.

Swift Blink.description: Teleport to a target point up to 1200 units away. After teleportation, you gain 40% phased movement speed and +35 Agility for 6 seconds. Swift Blink cannot be used for 3 seconds after taking damage from an enemy hero or Roshan.

name: Mjollnir
lore: Thor's magical hammer, made for him by the dwarves Brok and Eitri.

Static Charge.description: Places a charged shield on a target unit for 15 seconds which has a 20% chance to release a 225 magical damage shocking bolt at a nearby attacker and 4 additional enemies.

Chain Lightning.description: Grants a 30% chance on attack to release a bolt of electricity that leaps between 12 targets within a 650 radius, dealing 180 magical damage to each. Lightning proc pierces evasion.

name: Faded Broach
lore: A life-saving jewel bestowed upon a young queen by a kindly vizier.

name: Eye of Skadi
lore: Extremely rare artifact, guarded by the azure dragons.

Cold Attack.description: Attacks lower enemy movement and attack speed and reduces heals, health regeneration and lifesteal by 40% for 3 seconds. Slows enemy ranged units by 50% movement speed and 60 attack speed. Slows enemy melee units by 20% movement speed and 30 attack speed.

name: Maelstrom
lore: A hammer forged for the gods themselves, Maelstrom allows its user to harness the power of lightning.

Chain Lightning.description: Grants a 30% chance on attack to release a bolt of electricity that leaps between 4 targets within a 650 radius, dealing 135 magical damage to each. Lightning proc pierces evasion.

name: Yasha and Kaya
lore: Yasha and Kaya when paired together share a natural resonance.

name: Satanic
lore: Immense power at the cost of your soul.

Lifesteal.description: Heals the attacker for 30% of attack damage dealt. Lifesteal from creeps is reduced by 50%

Unholy Rage.description: Increases Lifesteal percentage to 175% for 6 seconds. Lifesteal from creeps is reduced by 50%

name: Harpoon
lore: None

Draw Forth.description: When targeting an enemy, fire a harpoon at them, that pulls you and the target closer together. Ranged heroes pull the target up to 35% of the distance between them. Melee heroes always pull the target to their attack range.

Echo Strike.description: Causes melee attacks to attack twice in quick succession. The double attacks apply a 100% movement slow for 1 seconds on each strike.

name: Kaya and Sange
lore: Two of three known items of unimaginable power that many believe were crafted at the same enchanter's forge.

name: Sange and Yasha
lore: Sange and Yasha, when attuned by the moonlight and used together, become a very powerful combination.

name: Heaven's Halberd
lore: This halberd moves with the speed of a smaller weapon, allowing the bearer to win duels that a heavy edge would not.

Disarm.description: Prevents a target from attacking for 3 seconds on melee targets, and 5 seconds on ranged targets.

name: Mage Slayer
lore: Forged by a secret order in The Third Age of Praxa'cia to fell the False King.

Mage Slayer.description: Places a debuff when you attack enemies, causing them to do 35% less spell damage for 6 seconds.

name: Diffusal Blade
lore: An enchanted blade that allows the user to cut straight into the enemy's soul.

Inhibit.description: Targets an enemy, slowing it for 4 seconds.

Manabreak.description: Each attack burns 40 mana from the target, and deals 1 physical damage per burned mana. Burns 8 mana per attack from melee illusions and 8 mana per attack from ranged illusions.

name: Phylactery
lore: None

Empower Spell.description: The next single target spell you cast on an enemy deals a separate 150 bonus damage to the target and slows them by 50% for 1.5 seconds. Cooldown: 6s

name: Sange
lore: Sange is an unusually accurate weapon, seeking weak points automatically.

name: Echo Sabre
lore: A deceptively swift blade imbued with resonant magic.

Echo Strike.description: Causes melee attacks to attack twice in quick succession. The double attacks apply a 100% movement slow for 0.8 seconds on each strike.

name: Kaya
lore: The staff of a renowned sorceress, lost for countless millennia.

name: Dragon Lance
lore: The forward charge of the wyvern host grants no quarter.

Dragon's Reach.description: Increases attack range of ranged heroes by 150.

name: Bloodthorn
lore: A reviled blade that bites deeper with each wriggle of its victim's final throes.

Soul Rend.description: Silences a target for 5 seconds. At the end of the silence, an additional 60% of all damage taken during the silence will be dealt to the target as magical damage. All attacks on the silenced target will have 100% accuracy.

Mage Slayer.description: Places a debuff when you attack enemies, causing them to do 35% less spell damage for 6 seconds.

name: Yasha
lore: Yasha is regarded as the swiftest weapon ever created.

name: Abyssal Blade
lore: The lost blade of the Commander of the Abyss, this edge cuts into an enemy's soul.

Overwhelm.description: Stuns a target enemy unit for 1.6 seconds. Pierces Spell Immunity.

Bash.description: Grants melee heroes a 25% chance on hit to stun the target for 1.2 seconds and deal 120 bonus physical damage. Bash chance for ranged heroes is 10%.

Damage Block.description: Grants a 60% chance to block 70 damage from incoming attacks on melee heroes, and 35 damage on ranged.

name: Revenant's Brooch
lore: The cursed brooch of a fallen guardian who stalks forever between the veil of life and death.

Phantom Province.description: Your next 5 attacks have True Strike, apply a debuff that reduces their magical defenses by 20% and deal magic damage. Can attack ethereal units.

Witch Blade.description: Causes your next attack to apply a poison for 4 seconds, slowing by 25% and dealing 1x your intelligence as damage every second. This attack has True Strike.

name: Butterfly
lore: Only the mightiest and most experienced of warriors can wield the Butterfly, but it provides incredible dexterity in combat.

name: Disperser
lore: None

Suppress.description: Affects all units in a 350 AoE around the target. All enemies around the target are slowed for 4 seconds. All allies around the target receive a basic dispel, increase their movement speed, and are unslowable for 4 seconds. Both movement speed reduction and increase start at 100% and gradually decrease to 0% over the course of the buff duration.

Manabreak.description: Each attack burns 40 mana from the target, and deals 1 physical damage per burned mana. Burns 8 mana per attack from melee illusions and 8 mana per attack from ranged illusions.

name: Monkey King Bar
lore: A powerful staff used by a master warrior.

Pierce.description: Grants each attack a 80% chance to pierce through evasion and deal 70 bonus magical damage.

name: Daedalus
lore: A weapon of incredible power that is difficult for even the strongest of warriors to control.

Critical Strike.description: Grants each attack a 30% chance to deal 225% damage.

name: Silver Edge
lore: Once used to slay an unjust king, only to have the kingdom erupt into civil war in the aftermath.

Shadow Walk.description: Makes you invisible for 14 seconds, or until you attack or cast a spell.  While invisible, you move 25% faster and can move through units. Attacking to end the invisibility will deal 175 bonus physical damage and a guaranteed 160% critical strike to the target, and disable their passive abilities for 4 seconds.

Critical Strike.description: Grants each attack a 30% chance to deal 160% damage.

name: Divine Rapier
lore: So powerful, it cannot have a single owner.

Unholy Strength.description: When active, Unholy Strength grants +35 damage, +25 strength and +4 armor, but drains 45 health per second. You cannot die from the health drain when Unholy Strength is activated, nor from the strength loss when Unholy Strength is deactivated.

name: Desolator
lore: A wicked weapon, used in torturing political criminals.

Corruption.description: Your attacks reduce the target's armor by 6 for 7 seconds.

Soul Stealer.description: Desolator gains +2 damage every time an enemy hero dies while affected by Corruption, to a maximum of 30.

Burn.description: When active, scorches enemies for 60 magical damage per second, and causes them to miss 15% of their attacks. Illusions deal 35 magical damage per second.

name: Skull Basher
lore: A feared weapon in the right hands, this maul's ability to shatter the defenses of its opponents should not be underestimated.

Bash.description: Grants melee heroes a 25% chance on hit to stun the target for 1.2 seconds and deal 100 bonus physical damage. Bash chance for ranged heroes is 10%.

name: Shadow Blade
lore: The blade of a fallen king, it allows you to move unseen and strike from the shadows.

Shadow Walk.description: Makes you invisible for 14 seconds, or until you attack or cast a spell. While Shadow Walk is active, you move 20% faster and can move through units. If attacking to end the invisibility, you gain 175 bonus physical damage on that attack.

name: Battle Fury
lore: The bearer of this mighty axe gains the ability to cut down swaths of enemies at once.

Quell.description: Increases attack damage against non-hero units by 10 for melee heroes, and 5 for ranged.

Cleave.description: Deals 70% of attack damage as physical damage in a cone up to 650 around the target. Deals 40% against creeps. (Melee Only)

name: Ethereal Blade
lore: A flickering blade of a ghastly nature, it is capable of dealing damage in both magical and physical planes.

Ether Blast.description: Converts the target unit to ethereal form, rendering them immune to physical damage, but unable to attack and 40% more vulnerable to magic damage. Enemy targets are also slowed by 80%, and take 1.5x your target's primary attribute + 50 as magical damage.

name: Nullifier
lore: A dangerous weapon pilfered from an inverse dimension.

Nullify.description: Dispels the target and applies a debuff for 5 seconds. Continuously dispels the target.

name: Manta Style
lore: An axe made of reflective materials that causes confusion amongst enemy ranks.

Mirror Image.description: Creates 2 images of your hero that last 20 seconds. Melee images deal 33% damage, while Ranged images deal 28%. Illusions take 300% damage.

name: Crystalys
lore: A blade forged from rare crystals, it seeks weak points in enemy armor.

Critical Strike.description: Grants each attack a 30% chance to deal 160% damage.

name: Assault Cuirass
lore: Forged in the depths of the nether reaches, this hellish mail provides an army with increased armor and attack speed.

Assault Aura.description: Grants 30 attack speed and 5 armor to nearby allied units and structures, and decreases nearby enemy unit and structure armor by 5.

name: Linken's Sphere
lore: This magical sphere once protected one of the most famous heroes in history.

Spellblock.description: Blocks most targeted spells once every 14 seconds.

Transfer Spellblock.description: Temporarily removes Spellblock from the item's owner and transfers it to an allied unit for 14 seconds.

name: Shiva's Guard
lore: Said to have belonged to a goddess, today it retains much of its former power.

Arctic Blast.description: Emits a freezing wave that deals 200 magical damage to enemies and slows their movement by 40% for 4 seconds.

Freezing Aura.description: Reduces the attack speed of all enemies by 45 and all heals, regeneration and lifesteal by 25%.

name: Hurricane Pike
lore: A legendary pike once held as royal sigil of the ancient wyvern riders.

Hurricane Thrust.description: Pushes you and target enemy 450 units away from each other, and for 6 seconds, allows you to make 5 attacks against the target without range restrictions and with +100 attack speed. Works like Force Staff when used on self or allies.

Dragon's Reach.description: Increases attack range of ranged heroes by 150.

name: Heart of Tarrasque
lore: Preserved heart of an extinct monster, it bolsters the bearer's fortitude.

name: Meteor Hammer
lore: An enchanted hammer forged of metals discovered in the ruins of a village destroyed by a great star storm.

Meteor Hammer.description: After a successful channel, summons a meteor that strikes a 400 AoE, stunning enemies for 0.5 seconds and dealing impact damage. Continues to deal damage over time to enemy units and buildings for 6 seconds. Non-building units are also slowed for 20% for the duration of the burn.

name: Bloodstone
lore: The Bloodstone's bright ruby color is unmistakable on the battlefield, as the owner seems to have infinite vitality and spirit.

Bloodpact.description: Increases Bloodstone's Spell Lifesteal by 2.5x and also converts the same percentage of damage dealt to mana. Lasts 6 seconds.

name: Lotus Orb
lore: The jewel at its center still reflects a pale image of its creator.

Echo Shell.description: Applies a shield to the target unit for 6 seconds which re-casts most targeted spells back to their caster. The shielded unit will still take damage from the spell.

name: Black King Bar
lore: A powerful staff imbued with the strength of giants.

Avatar.description: Applies a Basic Dispel. Grants 50% Magic resistance and immunity to pure and reflected damage. For the duration of the effect, any negative effect from enemy spells has no effect.

name: Crimson Guard
lore: A cuirass originally built to protect against the dreaded Year Beast.

Guard.description: For 8 seconds, grant nearby allied heroes and buildings a 100% chance to block 70 + 50% of caster's strength as damage from each incoming attack. Units may only be affected by Guard once every 8 seconds.

Damage Block.description: Grants a 60% chance to block 75 damage from incoming attacks on melee heroes, and 50 damage on ranged.

name: Blade Mail
lore: A razor-sharp coat of mail, it is the choice of selfless martyrs in combat.

Damage Return.description: For 5.5 seconds, the damage returned from all sources is increased by 85%.

Damage Return (Passive).description: Everytime you are attacked, you return 20 damage plus 20% of the attack damage dealt to you.

name: Eternal Shroud
lore: A pristine hood that feeds upon strife to empower its owner.

Shroud.description: Restores Mana equal to 30% of incoming enemy spell damage

name: Aeon Disk
lore: A powerful artifact long ago smuggled out of the Ivory Incubarium. Or so many believe.

Combo Breaker.description: When you take damage and your health falls below 70%, a strong dispel is applied and you gain a  second buff that provides +75% Status Resistance and causes all damage you deal and are dealt to be reduced to zero. Only triggers on player based damage. Cooldown increases every time it triggers.

name: Soul Booster
lore: Regain lost courage.

name: Wind Waker
lore: Proof enough to some that unseen forces manipulate the happenings of the material plane.

Cyclone.description: Sweeps a target unit up into a cyclone, making them invulnerable for 2.5 seconds. Cyclone can be cast on yourself, enemy units or allied units. Enemy units take 50 magical damage upon landing.

name: Vanguard
lore: A powerful shield that defends its wielder from even the most vicious of attacks.

Damage Block.description: Grants a 60% chance to block 50 damage from incoming attacks on melee heroes, and 25 damage on ranged.

name: Gleipnir
lore: Bindings forged by impossible means to leash an ancient evil.

Eternal Chains.description: Roots all enemies in a target 375 radius for 2 seconds and deals 180 damage.

Chain Lightning.description: Grants a 30% chance on attack to release a bolt of electricity that leaps between 4 targets within a 650 radius, dealing 160 magical damage to each. Lightning proc pierces evasion.

name: Scythe of Vyse
lore: The most guarded relic among the cult of Vyse, it is the most coveted weapon among magi.

Hex.description: Turns a target unit into a harmless critter for 2.8 seconds. The target has a base movement speed of 140 and will be silenced, muted, and disarmed. Instantly destroys illusions.

name: Refresher Orb
lore: A powerful artifact created for wizards.

Reset Cooldowns.description: Resets the cooldowns of all your items and abilities. Shares a cooldown with Refresher Shard. This item's cooldown only progresses in your hero's main inventory.

name: Aghanim's Scepter
lore: The scepter of a wizard with demigod-like powers.

Ability Upgrade.description: Upgrades the ultimate, and some abilities, of all heroes.

name: Octarine Core
lore: At the core of spellcraft are spectrums only the very gifted can sense.

Cooldown Reduction.description: Reduces the cooldown time of all spells and items by 25%.

name: Aghanim's Blessing
lore: The scepter of a wizard with demigod-like powers.

Ability Upgrade.description: Upgrades the ultimate, and some abilities, of all heroes.

name: Rod of Atos
lore: Atos, the Lord of Blight, has his essence stored in this deceptively simple wand.

name: Force Staff
lore: Allows you to manipulate others, for good or evil.

Force.description: Pushes any target unit 600 units in the direction it is facing.

name: Orchid Malevolence
lore: A garnet rod constructed from the essence of a fire demon.

Soul Burn.description: Silences the target unit for 5 seconds. At the end of the silence, 30% of the damage received while silenced is inflicted as bonus magical damage.

name: Solar Crest
lore: A talisman forged to honor the daytime sky.

Shine.description: When cast on an ally, grants them 7 armor, 70 attack speed, and 15% movement speed. When cast on an enemy, removes 7 armor, 70 attack speed, and 15% movement speed. Removes the armor from the caster when used. Cannot target spell immune enemies.

Energy Burst.description: Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit. Heals the caster 75% of damage dealt by Dagon. Upgradable.

name: Witch Blade
lore: A spiteful blade inadvertently possessed by the soul of its incautious creator.

Witch Blade.description: Causes your next attack to apply a poison for 4 seconds, slowing by 25% and dealing 0.75x your intelligence as damage every second. This attack has True Strike.

name: Eul's Scepter of Divinity
lore: A mysterious scepter passed down through the ages, its disruptive winds can be used for good or evil.

Cyclone.description: Sweeps a target unit up into a cyclone, making them invulnerable for 2.5 seconds. Cyclone can only be cast on enemy units or yourself. Enemy units take 50 magical damage upon landing.

name: Aether Lens
lore: Polished with the incantation of his final breath, the gift of a dying mage to his sickly son.

Aethereal Focus.description: Increases targeted spell and item cast range by 225.

name: Pipe of Insight
lore: A powerful artifact of mysterious origin, it creates barriers against magical forces.

Barrier.description: Gives a shield that blocks 450 magic damage to all nearby allies. Lasts 12 seconds.

Insight Aura.description: Gives allied units 2.5 health regeneration and 10% magic resistance.

name: Veil of Discord
lore: The headwear of corrupt magi.

Magic Weakness.description: Cast a 600 radius blast that causes enemies to take 18% increased damage from spells.

name: Holy Locket
lore: A prized relic long thought lost forever in a failed crusade.

Energy Charge.description: Target an allied unit to instantly restore 15 health and mana per charge stored. Max 20 charges. Automatically gains a charge every 10 seconds and whenever a visible enemy within 1200 range uses an ability.

name: Glimmer Cape
lore: The stolen cape of a master illusionist.

Glimmer.description: After a 0.5 second delay, grants invisibility, 40 movement speed and a magic damage barrier that absorbs up to 300 damage to you or a target allied unit for 5 seconds. Can be cast while channelling.

name: Vladmir's Offering
lore: An eerie mask that is haunted with the malice of a fallen vampire.

Vladmir's Aura.description: Grants 20% lifesteal, 18% bonus damage, 1.75 mana regeneration, and 3 armor to nearby allies. Lifesteal from creeps is reduced by 50%

name: Spirit Vessel
lore: Forged by a god to entrap the soul of another.

Soul Release.description: When used against enemies, it reduces health by 4% of current health per second, and reduces HP regeneration and healing by 45%. Deals 35 damage per second. When used on allies, it provides 40 health regeneration per second. Lasts 8 seconds. Gains charges every time an enemy hero dies within 1400 units. Only the closest Spirit Vessel to the dying hero will gain a charge.

name: Guardian Greaves
lore: One of many holy instruments constructed to honor the Omniscience.

Mend.description: Restores 350 health and 200 mana to nearby allies, and removes most negative effects from the caster.

Guardian Aura.description: Provides 2.5 health regeneration and 3 armor to allied units. If an allied hero's health falls below 25%, they receive 12 health regeneration and 8 armor.

name: Boots of Bearing
lore: Resplendent footwear fashioned for the ancient herald that first dared spread the glory of Stonehall beyond the original borders of its nascent claim.

Endurance.description: Gives +50 attack speed, +15% Movement Speed to nearby allies for 6 seconds. For the first 1.5 seconds allies are immune to slows.

name: Mekansm
lore: A glowing jewel formed out of assorted parts that somehow fit together perfectly.

Restore.description: Heals 275 health to allied units in a 1200 radius.

Mekansm Aura.description: Grants 2.5 health regeneration to allied units in a 1200 radius.

name: Orb of Corrosion
lore: Seepage from the wounds of a warrior deity, sealed in an arcanist's orb following a campaign of vicious slaughter.

Corrosion.description: Dealing 3 damage per second, reducing armor by 3, and slowing movement speed by 13% if the equipped hero is melee, or by 4% if they are ranged. Lasts 3 seconds.

Break.description: Whenever you attack a hero or are attacked by any unit, the bonus 14 HP regen is lost and the movement speed bonus is reduced to 40 for 13 seconds.

name: Drum of Endurance
lore: A relic that enchants the bodies of those around it for swifter movement in times of crisis.

Endurance.description: Consumes a charge and gives +45 attack speed and +13% movement speed to nearby allies for 6 seconds. Comes with 8 charges.

name: Soul Ring
lore: A ring that feeds on the souls of those who wear it.

Sacrifice.description: Consume 170 health to temporarily gain 170 mana. Lasts 10 seconds. If the mana gained cannot fit in your mana pool, it creates a buffer of mana that will be used before your mana pool.

name: Medallion of Courage
lore: The bearer has no fear of combat.

Valor.description: If cast on an ally, grants them the 6 armor, and removing it from the caster. If cast on an enemy, reduces 6 armor on both the enemy and the caster. Cannot target spell immune enemies.

name: Pavise
lore: None

Protect.description: When cast on an ally, grants them a barrier that absorbs 300 physical damage. Duration: 8s.

name: Arcane Boots
lore: Magi equipped with these boots are valued in battle.

Replenish Mana.description: Restores 175 mana to all nearby allies.

name: Wraith Band
lore: A circlet with faint whispers echoing about it.

name: Sacred Relic
lore: An ancient weapon that often turns the tides of war.

name: Reaver
lore: A massive axe capable of tearing whole mountains down.

name: Magic Wand
lore: A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.

Energy Charge.description: Instantly restores 15 health and mana per charge stored. Max 20 charges. Gains a charge whenever a visible enemy within 1200 range uses an ability.

name: Bracer
lore: The bracer is a common choice to toughen up defenses and increase longevity.

name: Mystic Staff
lore: Enigmatic staff made of only the most expensive crystals.

name: Eaglesong
lore: Capturing the majestic call of an eagle, this mystical horn brings limitless dexterity to those who hear it.

name: Null Talisman
lore: A small gemstone attached to several chains.

name: Talisman of Evasion
lore: A necklace that allows you to anticipate enemy attacks.

name: Hyperstone
lore: A mystical, carved stone that boosts the fervor of the holder.

name: Platemail
lore: Thick metal plates that protect the entire upper body. Avoid dropping on feet.

name: Demon Edge
lore: One of the oldest weapons forged by the Demon-Smith Abzidian, it killed its maker when he tested its edge.

name: Ultimate Orb
lore: A mystical orb containing the essence of life.

name: Cornucopia
lore: None

name: Vitality Booster
lore: A ruby gemstone that has been passed down through generations of warrior kin.

name: Point Booster
lore: A perfectly formed amethyst that nourishes body and mind when held.

name: Void Stone
lore: Jewelry that was once used to channel nether realm magic, this ring pulses with energy.

name: Ring of Health
lore: A shiny ring found beneath a fat halfling’s corpse.

name: Energy Booster
lore: This lapis gemstone is commonly added to the collection of wizards seeking to improve their presence in combat.

name: Morbid Mask
lore: A mask that drains the energy of those caught in its gaze.

Lifesteal.description: Heals the attacker for 18% of attack damage dealt. Lifesteal from creeps is reduced by 50%

name: Blink Dagger
lore: The fabled dagger used by the fastest assassin ever to walk the lands.

Blink.description: Teleport to a target point up to 1200 units away. Blink Dagger cannot be used for 3 seconds after taking damage from an enemy hero or Roshan.

name: Ghost Scepter
lore: Imbues the wielder with a ghostly presence, allowing them to evade physical damage.

Ghost Form.description: You enter ghost form for 4 seconds, becoming immune to physical damage, but are unable to attack and 40% more vulnerable to magic damage.

name: Shadow Amulet
lore: A small talisman that clouds the senses of one's enemies when held perfectly still.

Fade.description: Grants invisibility to you or a target allied hero as long as the target unit remains still. Has a 1.25 second fade time, and breaks instantly upon moving. There is no cooldown when using this item on yourself.

name: Gem of True Sight
lore: Not one thrall creature of the depths,Nor spirit bound in drowning's keep,Nor Maelrawn the Tentacular,Shall rest till seas, gem comes to sleep.

Reveal.description: Gives True Sight over a 300 radius revealing wards and units even in Fog of War.

True Sight.description: Grants the ability to see invisible units and wards to any allied vision within 900 range of its carrier.

Everlasting.description: Dropped on death, and cannot be destroyed.

name: Cloak
lore: A cloak made of a magical material that works to dispel any magic cast on it.

name: Voodoo Mask
lore: A mask tuned to sip the arcane bindings that pass between caster and foe.

Spell Lifesteal.description: 10% of spell damage dealt to enemy heroes is returned to the caster as health, regardless of spell damage type. Lifesteal reduced to 2% against creeps.

name: Boots of Speed
lore: Fleet footwear, increasing movement.

name: Magic Stick
lore: A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.

Energy Charge.description: Instantly restores 15 health and mana per charge stored. Max 10 charges. Gains a charge whenever a visible enemy within 1200 range uses an ability.

name: Fluffy Hat
lore: Fine and functional foppery for the fashion-forward fighter.

name: Wind Lace
lore: Hasten to battle on wind-touched heels.

name: Sage's Mask
lore: A mask commonly used by mages and warlocks for various rituals.

name: Ring of Regen
lore: This ring is considered a good luck charm among the Gnomes.

name: Mithril Hammer
lore: A hammer forged of pure mithril.

name: Claymore
lore: A sword that can cut through armor, it's a commonly chosen first weapon for budding swordsmen.

name: Quarterstaff
lore: A basic staff that allows you to strike quickly.

name: Blitz Knuckles
lore: An underground arcanist's update of a back-alley classic.

name: Helm of Iron Will
lore: The helmet of a legendary warrior who fell in battle.

name: Broadsword
lore: The classic weapon of choice for knights, this blade is sturdy and reliable for slaying enemies.

name: Chainmail
lore: A medium weave of metal chains.

name: Javelin
lore: A rather typical spear that can sometimes pierce through an enemy's armor when used to attack.

Pierce.description: Grants each attack a 30% chance to pierce through evasion and deal 70 bonus magical damage.

name: Blades of Attack
lore: The damage of these small, concealable blades should not be underestimated.

name: Orb of Venom
lore: Envenoms your veapon with the venom of a venomous viper.

Poison Attack.description: Poisons the target, dealing 2 magical damage per second and slowing movement by 13% if the equipped hero is melee, or by 4% if they are ranged. Lasts for 2 seconds.

name: Gloves of Haste
lore: A pair of magical gloves that seems to render weapons weightless.

name: Infused Raindrops
lore: Elemental protection from magical assaults.

Magical Damage Block.description: Consumes a charge to block 120 magic damage from damage instances over 75 damage. Comes with 6 charges. When the charges are gone, the item disappears.

name: Ring of Protection
lore: A glimmering ring that defends its bearer.

name: Staff of Wizardry
lore: A staff of magical powers passed down from the eldest mages.

name: Blight Stone
lore: An unnerving stone unearthed beneath the Fields of Endless Carnage.

Lesser Corruption.description: Your attacks reduce the target's armor by 2 for 8 seconds.

name: Quelling Blade
lore: The axe of a fallen gnome, it allows you to effectively maneuver the forest.

Quell.description: Increases attack damage against non-hero units by 8 for melee heroes, and 4 for ranged.

name: Belt of Strength
lore: A valued accessory for improving vitality.

name: Diadem
lore: None

name: Crown
lore: A stately crown created to ensure a well-meaning but ungifted heir could fend off usurpers and govern with a strong hand.

name: Ogre Axe
lore: You grow stronger just by holding it.

name: Robe of the Magi
lore: This robe corrupts the soul of the user, but provides wisdom in return.

name: Band of Elvenskin
lore: A tensile fabric often used for its light weight and ease of movement.

name: Circlet
lore: An elegant circlet designed for human princesses.

name: Blade of Alacrity
lore: A long blade imbued with time magic.

name: Iron Branch
lore: A seemingly ordinary branch, its ironlike qualities are bestowed upon the bearer.

Plant Tree.description: Targets the ground to plant a happy little tree that lasts for 20 seconds.

name: Slippers of Agility
lore: Light boots made from spider skin that tingles your senses.

name: Aghanim's Shard
lore: With origins known only to a single wizard, fragments of this impossible crystal are nearly as coveted as the renowned scepter itself.

Ability Upgrade.description: Upgrades an existing ability or adds a new ability to your hero.

name: Gauntlets of Strength
lore: Studded leather gloves that add brute strength.

name: Mantle of Intelligence
lore: A beautiful sapphire mantle worn by generations of queens.

name: Healing Salve
lore: A magical salve that can quickly mend even the deepest of wounds.

Salve.description: Grants 30 health regeneration to the target for 13 seconds. If the unit is attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan, the effect is lost. Heals for half the amount when cast on an ally.

name: Town Portal Scroll
lore: What a hero truly needs.

Teleport.description: After channeling for 3 seconds, teleports you to a target friendly building. Double-click to teleport to your team's base fountain.

Regenerate.description: Consumes a charge to restore 110 health and 60 mana over 3 seconds. If the hero is attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan, the effect is lost. The Bottle automatically refills at the fountain. Hold Control to use on an allied hero.

Store Rune.description: Runes can be stored in the bottle for later use by right-clicking them. Unused runes will automatically activate after 90 seconds. Using a stored rune fully refills the Bottle.

Arcane.description: Reduces cooldowns and mana costs by 30%.

Illusion.description: Conjures 2 illusions of your hero which deal 35% damage. Melee illusions take 200% damage. Ranged illusions take 300% damage. Illusions last 75 seconds.

Invisibility.description: Becomes invisible for 45 seconds. This invisibility is broken by attacking or by using an ability or item.

Regeneration.description: Regenerates health and mana to maximum.

Shield.description: Grants an All Damage Barrier for 75s equal to 50% of your max HP.

name: Dust of Appearance
lore: One may hide visage, but never volume.

Reveal.description: For 12 seconds, creates an area that reveals invisible and slows heroes by 20% in an 1050 radius where the caster  was standing. Invisible units revealed by dust take 25 damage. The debuff effect on enemies lingers for 8s after leaving the area of effect.

name: Faerie Fire
lore: The ethereal flames from the ever-burning ruins of Kindertree ignite across realities.

name: Enchanted Mango
lore: The bittersweet flavors of Jidi Isle are irresistible to amphibians.

name: Blood Grenade
lore: None

Throw Grenade.description: Throws a grenade at the target area. Enemies in the area will take 50 damage on impact, be slowed by 15% and take 15 damage per second.

name: Clarity
lore: Clear water that enhances the ability to meditate.

Replenish.description: Grants 6 mana regeneration to the target for 25 seconds. If the unit is attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan, the effect is lost.

name: Sentry Ward
lore: A form of plant originally grown in the garden of a fearful king.

Plant.description: Plants a Sentry Ward, an invisible watcher that grants True Sight, the ability to see invisible enemy units and wards, to any existing allied vision within a  radius. Lasts 7 minutes. Does not grant ground vision. Hold Control to give one Sentry Ward to an allied hero.

True Sight.description: Adds the ability to see invisible units and wards to any allied vision within the Sentry Ward's range.

Planted Ward.description: This unit is permanently invisible and phased.

name: Smoke of Deceit
lore: The charlatan wizard Myrddin's only true contribution to the arcane arts.

Disguise.description: Turns the caster and all allied player-controlled units in a 1200 radius invisible, and grants 15% bonus movement speed for 45 seconds. While the caster is still disguised, any allies that come within 45 range of them will also get the buff applied to them. Each smoke can only be applied once to allies. Attacking, or moving within 1025 range of an enemy hero or tower, will break the invisibility. Disguise grants invisibility that is immune to True Sight.

name: Tango
lore: Forage to survive on the battlefield.

Devour.description: Consumes a target tree to gain 7 health regeneration for 16 seconds. Consuming an Ironwood Tree doubles the heal amount. Comes with 3 charges. Can be used on an allied hero to give them one Tango.
